  • Constructor Details

    • ItemsDB

      public ItemsDB()

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static void create​(java.util.ArrayList<Items> itemArray)
      Takes an arrayList of items and inputs each one into the database. Designed to work over an ArrayList to minimise separate connections to the database when adding items - allowing for bulk uploads.
      Parameters:
      itemArray - : An ArrayList of Items class objects should be constructed prior to being input here.

    • readSearch

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> readSearch​(java.lang.String search)
      Searches the database for items which contain the search term in their name and returns the available choices in the form of an ArrayList. If no options match a message is displayed.
      Parameters:
      search - : The search term that wants to be found in the Items database.
      Returns:
      : Returns an ArrayList of integers corresponding to the Items ids that match the search term.

    • idSearch

      public static Items idSearch​(int id)
      Returns the Items class object from the database matching the id specified.
      Parameters:
      id - : Primary key of the Items object in the database.
      Returns:
      : Returns the Items object from the database.

    • update

      public static void update​(Items item)
      Takes an Items object and updates it in the database.
      Parameters:
      item - : A (hopefully) modified Items class object from what is in the database.

    • delete

      public static void delete​(Items item)
      Allows for deletion of an entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      item - : Takes an Items class object and removes it, designed to work with idSearch.
